mapper.sql:
/* 핫한 애니 리스트 조회 쿼리(상세) */
select r_anime_no as animeNo , count(r_anime_no) as viewCnt from web_app_test2.tb_anime_view group by r_anime_no order by viewCnt desc limit 6
mapper.select:
/* 핫한 애니 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select tb_a.r_anime_no as animeNo , tb_a.title as animeTitle , tb_a.author as animeAuthor , tb_a.link as link , ifnull(tb_a_v.viewCnt, 0) as viewCnt , concat(tb_a_t_i.file_path, '/', tb_a_t_i.file_name) as filePullPath , date_format(tb_a.anime_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as animeRegDt , date_format(tb_a.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_anime as tb_a left outer join () as tb_a_v on tb_a.r_anime_no = tb_a_v.animeNo left outer join web_app_test2.tb_anime_thumbnail_img as tb_a_t_i on tb_a.r_anime_no = tb_a_t_i.r_anime_no where tb_a.use_yn = 'y'

/* 전체 만화책 개수 조회 쿼리 */
select count(*) from web_app_test2.tb_anime where use_yn = 'y'

/* 전체 애니 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select r_anime_no as animeNo , m_n_no as madeNatureNo , title as animeTitle , author as animeAuthor , link as link , finalized_yn as finalizedYnEnum , anime_broadcast_cnt as animeBroadcastCnt , use_yn as animeUseYnEnum , date_format(anime_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as animeRegDt , date_format(reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_anime where use_yn = 'y' order by str_to_date(animeRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d') desc

/* 전체 애니 리스트 조회 쿼리(pagination) */
select r_anime_no as animeNo , m_n_no as madeNatureNo , title as animeTitle , author as animeAuthor , link as link , finalized_yn as finalizedYnEnum , anime_broadcast_cnt as animeBroadcastCnt , use_yn as animeUseYnEnum , date_format(anime_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as animeRegDt , date_format(reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_anime where use_yn = 'y' order by str_to_date(animeRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d') desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}

/* 단일 애니 상세 정보 조회 쿼리 */
select tb_a.r_anime_no as animeNo , tb_a.m_n_no as madeNatureNo , tb_a.title as animeTitle , tb_a.author as animeAuthor , tb_a.link as link , tb_a.finalized_yn as finalizedYnEnum , tb_a.anime_broadcast_cnt as animeBroadcastCnt , tb_a.use_yn as animeUseYnEnum , ifnull(tb_a_v.viewCnt, 0) as viewCnt , concat(tb_a_t_i.file_path, '/', tb_a_t_i.file_name) as filePullPath , date_format(tb_a.anime_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as animeRegDt , date_format(tb_a.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_anime as tb_a left outer join ( select r_anime_no as animeNo , count(view_no) as viewCnt from web_app_test2.tb_anime_view group by r_anime_no ) as tb_a_v on tb_a.r_anime_no = tb_a_v.animeNo left outer join web_app_test2.tb_anime_thumbnail_img as tb_a_t_i on tb_a.r_anime_no = tb_a_t_i.r_anime_no where tb_a.use_yn = 'y' and tb_a.r_anime_no = #{animeNo}
